situation: Had a meeting with my manager and they looked distracted the whole time.
thought: They must be disappointed in me. I probably messed something up again.
behavior: Kept my responses short, avoided eye contact, left the call early.

situation: Woke up and saw I had 12 missed messages from work Slack.
thought: I'm falling behind. Everyone is waiting on me. They're annoyed.
behavior: Scrolled through them but avoided replying for 2 hours.

situation: Shipped a bug to production and the team had to hotfix it.
thought: I'm a terrible engineer. I always ruin things when I'm moving too fast.
behavior: Apologized in the thread and muted notifications after.

situation: Got a compliment on my last project during standup.
thought: They probably didn't mean it. They're just being polite.
behavior: I smiled, but immediately changed the topic.
